function.name: acos
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose cosine is z. Principal value for complex z.

function.name: acosh
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose hyperbolic cosine is z. The result is the principal value for complex z.

function.name: acot
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose cotangent is z. The result is between 0 and pi if z is real, and the principal value if z is complex.

function.name: acoth
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose hyperbolic cotangent is z. The result is the principal value for complex z.

function.name: acsc
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose cosecant is z. The result is the principal value for complex z.

function.name: acsch
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose hyperbolic arccosecant is z. The result is the principal value for complex z.

function.name: Adams
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the differential equation specified by the derivatives in D, and having initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2], using Adams methods. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: AdamsBDF
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the differential equation specified by the derivatives in D, and having initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2], using BDF methods for stiff systems and Adams methods for non-stiff systems. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: Ai
function.description: Returns the value of the Airy function of the first kind.

function.name: Ai.sc
function.description: Returns the value of the Airy function of the first kind, scaled by the factor Re(exp(2/3*z^(3/2))).

function.name: angle
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) between the x-axis and the point (x, y). x and y must be real.

function.name: ε
function.description: Returns the completely antisymmetric tensor of rank 3. Result is 0 if any two arguments are the same, 1 for even permutations, -1 for odd permutations..

function.name: APPENDPRN
function.description: Writes the contents of an array to the end of a delimited ASCII file.

function.name: arg
function.description: Returns the principal argument of the complex number z, between -pi and pi, including pi.

function.name: asec
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose secant is z. The result is the principal value for complex z.

function.name: asech
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose hyperbolic secant is z. Result is the principal value for complex z.

function.name: asin
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose sine is z. Principal value for complex z.

function.name: asinh
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose hyperbolic sine is z. Principal value for complex z.

function.name: atan
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose tangent is z. Principal value for complex z.

function.name: atan2
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) from the x-axis to a line containing the origin (0,0) and the point (x,y). Both x and y must be real.

function.name: atanh
function.description: Returns the angle (in radians) whose hyperbolic tangent is z. Principal value for complex z.

function.name: augment
function.description: Returns an array formed by placing A, B, C, ... left to right

function.name: BDF
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the stiff differential equation specified by the derivatives in D, and initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2], using backwards differentiation formula methods. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: bei
function.description: Returns the value of the imaginary Bessel Kelvin function of order m.

function.name: ber
function.description: Returns the value of the real Bessel Kelvin function of order m.

function.name: Bi
function.description: Returns the value of the Airy function of the second kind.

function.name: Bi.sc
function.description: Returns the value of the Airy function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Re(2/3*z^3/2)|).

function.name: bspline
function.description: Returns a vector of the coefficients of a B-spline of degree n for the data in vx and vy, given the knot values in u. The vector returned becomes the first argument of the interp function.

function.name: Bulstoer
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the smooth differential equation specified by the derivatives in D using a Bulirsch-Stoer method.

function.name: bvalfit
function.params: v1, v2, x1, x2, xf, D, load1, load2, score
function.description: Returns a vector of initial conditions for the boundary value problem specified by the derivatives in D where the solution is known at the intermediate point xf.

function.name: ceil
function.description: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to z.

function.name: Ceil
function.description: Returns the smallest multiple of y greater than or equal to z, typically used for correct unit scaling.

function.name: cfft
function.description: Returns the Discrete Fourier transform of any size vector or matrix of real or complex numbers. Returns an array of the same size as its argument.

function.name: CFFT
function.description: Returns the Discrete Fourier transform of any size vector or matrix of real or complex numbers. Returns an array of the same size as its argument. Similar to cfft(A), with a different normalizing factor and sign convention.

function.name: Chi
function.description: Returns the value of the hyperbolic cosine integral function. Can only be evaluated symbolically.

function.name: cholesky
function.description: Returns the lower triangular matrix L such that L times L transpose is M. L is the cholesky square root of the input matrix.

function.name: Ci
function.description: Returns the value of the cosine integral function. Can only be evaluated symbolically.

function.name: cnorm
function.description: Returns the cumulative probability distribution with mean 0 and variance 1.

function.name: cnper
function.description: Returns the number of compounding periods for an investment to yield a specified future value.

function.name: cols
function.description: Returns the number of columns in A.

function.name: combin
function.description: Returns the number of subsets (combinations) of k elements that can be formed from n elements.

function.name: concat
function.description: Returns the string formed by concatenating strings S1, S2, and so on.

function.name: cond1
function.description: Returns the condition number of the matrix M based on the L1 norm.

function.name: cond2
function.description: Returns the condition number of the matrix M based on the L2 norm.

function.name: conde
function.description: Returns the condition number of the matrix M based on the Euclidean norm.

function.name: condi
function.description: Returns the condition number of the matrix M based on the infinity norm.

function.name: corr
function.description: Returns the Pearson's r correlation coefficient of the elements in A and B.

function.name: correl
function.description: Returns the correlation of vectors vx and vy. Result is a vector for which each element contains the summed vector product of vx and a shifted version of vy.

function.name: correl2d
function.description: Returns the 2D correlation of matrix M with kernel K. The resulting matrix contains the summed element-wise product of K overlapped with a subset of M.

function.name: cos
function.description: Returns the cosine of z.

function.name: cosh
function.description: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of z.

function.name: cot
function.description: Returns the cotangent of z.

function.name: coth
function.description: Returns the hyperbolic cotangent of z.

function.name: crate
function.description: Returns the fixed interest rate per period required for an investment at present value to yield a specified future value over a number of compounding periods.

function.name: CreateMesh
function.description: Returns a nested array of three matrices representing the x-, y-, and z-coordinates of a parametric surface defined by the function(s) of two variables in the first argument(s).

function.name: CreateSpace
function.description: Returns a nested array of three vectors representing the x-, y-, and z-coordinates of a space curve defined by the function(s) of one variable in the first argument.

function.name: csc
function.description: Returns the cosecant of z.

function.name: csch
function.description: Returns the hyperbolic cosecant of z.

function.name: csgn
function.description: Returns the complex sign of z, given by 0 if z = 0, 1 if the real or imaginary part of z is > 0, and -1 otherwise.

function.name: csort
function.description: Returns an array formed by rearranging rows of A until column n is in ascending order.

function.name: cspline
function.description: Returns a vector of cubic spline coefficients with cubic endpoints which fits the independent data in vector or matrix vx and dependent data in vy. This vector becomes the first argument of the interp function.

function.name: cumint
function.description: Returns the cumulative interest paid on a loan between a starting period and an ending period given a fixed interest rate, the total number of compounding periods, and the present value of the loan.

function.name: cumprn
function.description: Returns the cumulative principal paid on a loan between a starting period and an ending period given a fixed interest rate, the total number of compounding periods, and the present value of the loan.

function.name: cvar
function.description: Returns the covariance of the elements in A and B.

function.name: cyl2xyz
function.description: Converts the cylindrical coordinates of a point in 3D space to rectangular coordinates.

function.name: DAi
function.description: Returns the value of the first derivative of the Airy function of the first kind.

function.name: DAi.sc
function.description: Returns the value of the first derivative of the Airy function of the first kind, scaled by the factor Re(exp(2/3*z^(3/2))).

function.name: dbeta
function.description: Returns the probability density for the beta distribution with shape parameters s1 and s2.

function.name: DBi
function.description: Returns the value of the first derivative of the Airy function of the second kind.

function.name: DBi.sc
function.description: Returns the value of the first derivative of the Airy function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Re(2/3*z^3/2)|).

function.name: dbinom
function.description: Returns the probability density for the Binomial distribution.

function.name: dcauchy
function.description: Returns the probability density for the Cauchy distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: dchisq
function.description: Returns the probability density for the chi-squared distribution with degrees of freedom d.

function.name: denom
function.description: Returns the denominator of the fraction or rational expression x. Can only be evaluated symbolically.

function.name: dexp
function.description: Returns the probability density for the exponential distribution with rate of decay r.

function.name: dF
function.description: Returns the probability density for the F distribution with degrees of freedom d1 and d2.

function.name: dgamma
function.description: Returns the probability density for the gamma distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: dgeom
function.description: Returns the probability density for the Geometric distribtuion, with probability of success p.

function.name: dhypergeom
function.description: Returns the probability density for the hypergeometric distribution.

function.name: diag
function.description: Returns a matrix containing on its diagonal the elements of v.

function.name: dilog
function.description: Returns the value of the dilogarithm function. Can only be evaluated symbolically.

function.name: dlnorm
function.description: Returns the probability density for the lognormal distribution with logmean mu and logdeviation sigma.

function.name: dlogis
function.description: Returns the probability density for the logistic distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: DMS
function.description: Returns the angle in radians given a vector containing degrees, minutes, and seconds; or returns the vector given the angle when used in the units placeholder.

function.name: dnbinom
function.description: Returns the probability density for the negative binomial distribution with size n and probability of failure p.

function.name: dnorm
function.description: Returns the probability density for the normal distribution with mean mu and standard deviation sigma.

function.name: dpois
function.description: Returns the probability density for the Poisson distribution in which mean l.

function.name: dt
function.description: Returns the probability density for Student's t distribution with degrees of freedom d.

function.name: dunif
function.description: Returns the probability density for the uniform distribution on an interval [a,b].

function.name: dweibull
function.description: Returns the probability density for the Weibull distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: eff
function.description: Returns the effective annual interest rate (APR), given the nominal interest rate and the number of compounding periods per year.

function.name: Ei
function.description: Returns the value of the exponential integral function.

function.name: eigenvals
function.description: Returns a vector of eigenvalues for the square matrix M.

function.name: eigenvec
function.description: Returns the normalized eigenvector associated with eigenvalue z of the square matrix M. The eigenvector is normalized to unit length.

function.name: eigenvecs
function.description: Returns a matrix containing the normalized eigenvectors corresponding to the eigenvalues of the square matrix M. The nth column of the matrix returned is an eigenvector corresponding to the nth eigenvalue returned by eigenvals. Optional last argument "L" specifies the left eigenvalue.

function.name: erf
function.description: Returns the error function.

function.name: erfc
function.description: Returns the complementary error function.

function.name: error
function.description: Returns the string S as a Mathcad error tip.

function.name: exp
function.description: Returns the number e raised to the power z.

function.name: expfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing three coefficients for an exponential curve of the form a*e^(b*x)+c that best approximates the data in vectors vx and vy. The optional vector vg contains guess values for the three coefficients.

function.name: fft
function.description: Returns the fast Fourier transform of real data vector v with 2^n elements. Returns a vector of size 2^n-1 + 1. Similar to FFT(v), except uses a different normalizing factor and sign convention.

function.name: FFT
function.description: Returns the fast Fourier transform of real data vector v with 2^n elements. Returns a vector of size 2^n-1 + 1. Similar to fft(v), except uses a different normalizing factor and sign convention.

function.name: FIF
function.description: Returns a length given a string representing feet-inches-fractions; or returns the FIF string given a length when used in the units placeholder.

function.name: fhyper
function.description: Returns the value of the Gauss hypergeometric function at the point x given parameters a, b, c.

function.name: Find
function.description: Returns the values of var1, var2, ..., that solve a system of equations in a Solve Block. Returns a scalar if there is only one argument, otherwise returns a vector of answers.

function.name: floor
function.description: Returns the greatest integer less than or equal to z.

function.name: Floor
function.description: Returns the greatest multiple of y less than or equal to z, typically used for correct unit scaling.

function.name: format
function.description: Returns a string containing the value of the arguments x, y, z, ... with print order and surrounding text specified by S. S is optional if only one value is printed.

function.name: FresnelC
function.description: Returns the value of the Fresnel cosine integral function.

function.name: FresnelS
function.description: Returns the value of the Fresnel sine integral function.

function.name: fv
function.description: Returns the future value of an investment or loan given a periodic, constant payment and a fixed interest rate.

function.name: fvadj
function.description: Returns the future value of an initial principal after applying the series of compound interest rates in vector v.

function.name: fvc
function.description: Returns the future value of a vector of cash flows, v, earning a specified interest rate.

function.name: Γ
function.description: Returns either Euler's gamma function of z, or the incomplete gamma function of z with degree a. To type G, press G+[Ctrl]+G.

function.name: gcd
function.description: Returns the greatest common divisor: the largest integer that evenly divides all the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: genfit
function.description: Returns a vector of parameters that make the first function in the vector F best fit the data in the vectors vx and vy. The remaining elements in F are partial derivatives of the fitting function with respect to its n parameters, and vg is a vector of guess values. Right-click on this function to choose a solver.

function.name: geninv
function.description: Returns the generalized (pseudo) inverse of the input matrix A, giving the least-squares solution to a system of equations..

function.name: genvals
function.description: Returns a vector of eigenvalues which satisfy the generalized eigenvalue problem.

function.name: genvecs
function.description: Returns a matrix of normalized eigenvectors corresponding to the eigenvalues returned by genvals. Optional last argument "L" specifies the left eigenvalue.

function.name: GETWAVINFO
function.description: Returns a vector containing, in order, the number of channels, the sample rate, the bit resolution, and the average bytes per second for a WAV file.

function.name: gmean
function.description: Returns the geometric mean of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: H1
function.description: Returns the Hankel function of the first kind (Bessel function of the third kind).

function.name: H1.sc
function.description: Returns the Hankel function of the first kind (Bessel function of the third kind), scaled by the factor exp(-z*i).

function.name: H2
function.description: Returns the Hankel function of the second kind (Bessel function of the third kind).

function.name: H2.sc
function.description: Returns the Hankel function of the second kind (Bessel function of the third kind), scaled by the factor exp(z*i).

function.name: Φ
function.description: Returns the heaviside step function with value 1 if x is greater than or equal to 0, 0 otherwise. To type Phi, press F+[Ctrl]+G.

function.name: Her
function.description: Returns the value of the Hermite polynomial of degree n at x.

function.name: hhmmss
function.description: Returns a time given a string containing hours:minutes:seconds; or returns the string given a time when used in the units placeholder.

function.name: hist
function.description: Returns a vector representing the frequencies with which values in data fall into the intervals represented by intvls. intvls can be a vector of interval endpoints, or an integer number of subintervals of equal length.

function.name: histogram
function.description: Returns a two-column matrix containing the midpoints of the intvls subintervals. The second column is identical to the vector returned by hist. The resulting matrix has intvls rows.

function.name: hlookup
function.description: Looks in the first row of a matrix, A, for a given value, z, and returns the value(s) in the same column(s) in the row specified, r. When multiple values are returned, they appear in a vector.

function.name: hmean
function.description: Returns the harmonic mean of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: I0
function.description: Returns the zeroth order modified Bessel function of the first kind.

function.name: I0.sc
function.description: Returns the zeroth order modified Bessel function of the first kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Re(z)|).

function.name: I1
function.description: Returns the first order modified Bessel function of the first kind.

function.name: I1.sc
function.description: Returns the first order modified Bessel function of the first kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Re(z)|).

function.name: ibeta
function.description: Returns the value of the incomplete beta function of x and y with parameter a.

function.name: icfft
function.description: Returns the inverse Fourier transform corresponding to cfft. Returns an array of the same size as its argument.

function.name: ICFFT
function.description: Returns the inverse Fourier transform corresponding to CFFT. Returns an array of the same size as its argument.

function.name: identity
function.description: Returns an n x n identity matrix (a matrix of 0's with 1's along the diagonal).

function.name: if
function.description: Returns x if logical condition cond is true (non-zero), y otherwise.

function.name: ifft
function.description: Returns the inverse Fourier transform corresponding to fft. Takes a vector of size 1 + 2^n-1, where n is an integer. Returns a real vector of size 2^n.

function.name: IFFT
function.description: Returns the inverse Fourier transform corresponding to FFT. Takes a vector of size 1 + 2^n-1, where n is an integer. Returns a real vector of size 2^n.

function.name: Im
function.description: Returns the imaginary part of complex number, vector, or matrix, z.

function.name: In
function.description: Returns the mth order modified Bessel function of the first kind.

function.name: In.sc
function.description: Returns the mth order modified Bessel function of the first kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Re(z)|).

function.name: intercept
function.description: Returns the intercept of line that best fits data in vx and vy.

function.name: interp
function.description: Returns an interpolated value at x from the coefficients in vector vs, and the original data in vx and vy. Coefficient vector vs is the output of one of the following: cspline, lspline, pspline, bspline, loess, or regress.

function.name: ipmt
function.description: Returns the interest payment of an investment or loan for a given period based on periodic, constant payments over a given number of compounding periods using a fixed interest rate and a specified present value.

function.name: irr
function.description: Returns the internal rate of return for a series of cash flows occurring at regular intervals.

function.name: IsArray
function.description: Returns 1 if x is a matrix or vector. Returns 0 otherwise.

function.name: IsNaN
function.description: Returns 1 if x is NaN. Returns 0 otherwise.

function.name: IsPrime
function.description: Returns 1 if n is prime and 0 otherwise. Can only be evaluated symbolically.

function.name: IsScalar
function.description: Returns 1 if x is a real or complex scalar. Returns 0 otherwise.

function.name: IsString
function.description: Returns 1 if x is a string. Returns 0 otherwise.

function.name: iwave
function.description: Returns the inverse one-dimensional discrete wavelet transform of v computed using the Daubechies 4-coefficient wavelet filter in the wave function.

function.name: Jacob
function.description: Returns the Jacobian matrix of the vector function F(x).

function.name: J0
function.description: Returns the zeroth order Bessel function of the first kind.

function.name: J0.sc
function.description: Returns the zeroth order Bessel function of the first kind, scaled by exp(-|Im(z)|).

function.name: J1
function.description: Returns the first order Bessel function of the first kind.

function.name: J1.sc
function.description: Returns the first order Bessel function of the first kind, scaled by exp(-|Im(z)|).

function.name: Jac
function.description: Returns the value of the Jacobi polynomial of degree n at x with parameters a and b.

function.name: Jn
function.description: Returns the mth order Bessel function of the first kind.

function.name: Jn.sc
function.description: Returns the mth order Bessel function of the first kind, scaled by exp(-|Im(z)|).

function.name: js
function.description: Returns the value of the spherical Bessel function of the first kind, of order m.

function.name: K0
function.description: Returns the zeroth order modified Bessel function of the second kind.

function.name: K0.sc
function.description: Returns the zeroth order modified Bessel function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(z).

function.name: K1
function.description: Returns the first order modified Bessel function of the second kind.

function.name: K1.sc
function.description: Returns the first order modified Bessel function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(z).

function.name: Kn
function.description: Returns the mth order modified Bessel function of the second kind.

function.name: Kn.sc
function.description: Returns the mth order modified Bessel function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(z).

function.name: δ
function.description: Returns the Kronecker delta function with value 1 if x = y, 0 otherwise. To type Delta, press d+[Ctrl]+G.

function.name: ksmooth
function.description: Returns a vector of local weighted averages of vy using a Gaussian kernel with bandwidth b.

function.name: kurt
function.description: Returns the kurtosis of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: Lag
function.description: Returns the value of the Laguerre polynomial of degree n at x.

function.name: LambertW
function.description: Lambert(x) returns the value of the Lambert W function. Lambert(n,x) returns the value of the nth branch of the Lambert W function.

function.name: last
function.description: Returns the scalar index of the last element in vector v.

function.name: lcm
function.description: Returns the least common multiple: the smallest positive integer that is a multiple of all the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: Leg
function.description: Returns the value of the Legendre polynomial of degree n at x.

function.name: length
function.description: Returns the integer number of elements in vector v.

function.name: lgsfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing the 3 coefficients for a logistic curve of the form a/(1+b*e^(-c*x)) that best approximates the data in vectors vx and vy, using guess values in vg.

function.name: line
function.description: Returns a vector containing the coefficients for a line of the form a + bx that best approximates the data in vectors vx and vy.

function.name: linfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing the coefficients used to create a linear combination of the functions in vector F which best approximates the data in vx and vy.

function.name: linterp
function.description: Returns a linearly interpolated value at x for data vectors vx and vy of the same size.

function.name: ln
function.description: Returns the natural logarithm (base e) of z. Returns principal value (imaginary part between pi and -pi) for complex z.

function.name: ln0
function.description: Returns the natural logarithm (base e) of z but allows z = 0. Returns principal value (imaginary part between pi and -pi) for complex z.

function.name: lnΓ
function.description: Returns the natural logarithm of Euler's gamma function, evaluated at z. To type G, press G[Ctrl]G.

function.name: lnfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing the 2 coefficients for a logarithmic curve of the form a*ln(x) + b that best approximates the data in vx and vy.

function.name: LoadColormap
function.description: Returns an array containing the values in the colormap named file.

function.name: loess
function.description: Returns a vector used by the interp function to find a set of second order polynomials that best fit a neighborhood of data values in vectors or matrices vx and vy. The size of the neighborhood is controlled by span.

function.name: log
function.description: Returns the base b logarithm of z. If b is omitted, returns the base 10 logarithm.

function.name: logfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing the three coefficients for a logarithmic curve of the form a*ln(x+b)+c that best approximates the data in vectors vx and vy. Vector vg contains guess values for the three coefficients.

function.name: logpts
function.description: Returns a vector with dec decades of evenly-spaced points starting at 10 raised to the exponent minexp, with dnpts points per decade.

function.name: logspace
function.description: Returns a vector of npts logarithmically-spaced points starting at min, ending at max.

function.name: lookup
function.description: Looks in a vector or matrix, A, for a given value, z, and returns the value(s) in the same position(s) (i.e., with the same row and column numbers) in another matrix, B. When multiple values are returned, they appear in a vector.

function.name: lsolve
function.description: Returns the vector x solving the linear system of equations M*x = v.

function.name: lspline
function.description: Returns a vector of cubic spline coefficients with linear endpoints which fits the independent data in vector or matrix vx and dependent data in vy. This vector becomes the first argument of the interp function.

function.name: lu
function.description: Returns a matrix containing three augmented square matrices P, L, and U, all having the same size as M; these satisfy the equation P M = L U.

function.name: match
function.description: Looks in a vector or matrix, A, for a given value, z, and returns the index (indices) of its positions in A.

function.name: matrix
function.description: Returns a m x n matrix in which the ijth element is given by f(i,j).

function.name: max
function.description: Returns the largest value from A, B, C, ... If any value is complex, returns max(Re(A, B, C, ...)) + i*max(Im(A, B, C, ...)).

function.name: Maximize
function.description: Returns the values of var1, var2, ..., that satisfy the constraints in a Solve Block, and make the function f take on its greatest value. Returns a scalar if there is only one argument, otherwise returns a vector of answers.

function.name: mean
function.description: Returns the arithmetic mean, or average, of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: medfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing the coefficients for a line of the form a + bx that best approximates the data in vectors vx and vy using median-median regression.

function.name: median
function.description: Returns the median of the elements of A, B, C ...

function.name: medsmooth
function.description: Returns a smoothed vector by replacing each value in vy with the median of the n points centered on that value.

function.name: mhyper
function.description: Returns the value of the confluent hypergeometric function, M(a,b,x), at the point x with parameters a and b.

function.name: min
function.description: Returns the smallest value in A, B, C, ... If any value is complex, returns min(Re(A, B, C, ...)) + i*min(Im(A, B, C, ...)).

function.name: Minerr
function.description: Returns the values of var1, var2, ..., coming closest to satisfying a system of equations and constraints in a Solve Block. Returns a scalar if only one argument, otherwise returns a vector of answers. If Minerr cannot converge, it returns the results of the last iteration.

function.name: Minimize
function.description: Returns the values of var1, var2, ..., that satisfy the constraints in a Solve Block, and make the function f take on its smallest value. Returns a scalar if there is only one variable, otherwise returns a vector of answers.

function.name: mirr
function.description: Returns the modified internal rate of return for a vector v of cash flows given a finance rate and a reinvestment rate.

function.name: mod
function.description: Returns the remainder on dividing x by y (x modulo y). Result has the same sign as x.

function.name: mode
function.description: Returns the value in A, B, C, ... that occurs most often.

function.name: multigrid
function.description: Returns a square matrix of solution values for Poisson's partial differential equation, controlled by ncycle, in the case of zero boundaries. Otherwise, use the relax function.

function.name: nom
function.description: Returns the nominal interest rate, given the effective annual interest rate (APR) and the number of compounding periods per year.

function.name: norm1
function.description: Returns the L1 norm of the matrix M.

function.name: norm2
function.description: Returns the L2 norm of the matrix M.

function.name: norme
function.description: Returns the Euclidean norm of the matrix M.

function.name: normi
function.description: Returns the infinity norm of the matrix M.

function.name: nper
function.description: Returns the number of compounding periods for an investment or loan based on periodic, constant payments using a fixed interest rate and a specified present value.

function.name: npv
function.description: Returns the net present value of an investment given a discount rate and a series of cash flows occuring at regular intervals.

function.name: num2str
function.description: Returns the number z to a string.

function.name: numer
function.description: Returns the numerator of the fraction or rational expression x. Can only be evaluated symbolically.

function.name: numol
function.params: x_endpts, xpts, t_endpts, tpts, num_pde, num_pae, pde_func, pinit, bc_func
function.description: Returns an xpts by tpts matrix containing the solutions to the one-dimensional PDEs in pde_func. Each column represents a solution over 1-D space at a single solution time. For a system of equations, the solution for each function is appended horizontally, so the matrix always has xpts rows, and tpts * (num_pde + num_pae) columns.

function.name: Odesolve
function.description: Returns a function or vector of functions of x representing the solution to a system of ordinary differential equations in a Solve Block. vf is omitted when solving a single ODE.

function.name: pause
function.description: Returns a string containing the value of the arguments x, y, z, ... with print order and surrounding text specified by S. Prints values in the Trace Window and pauses execution when debug mode is on. S is optional if only one value is printed.

function.name: pbeta
function.description: Returns the cumulative probability beta distribution with shape parameters s1 and s2.

function.name: pbinom
function.description: Returns the cumulative probability binomial distribution for k successes in n trials, given a probability of success, q, per trial.

function.name: pcauchy
function.description: Returns the cumulative probability Cauchy distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: pchisq
function.description: Returns the cumulative probability chi-squared distribution with degrees of freedom d.

function.name: Pdesolve
function.description: Returns a vector u of functions of x and t representing the solution to a system of partial differential equations in a Solve Block over the ranges specified in xrange and trange.

function.name: permut
function.description: Returns the number of ways of ordering n distinct objects taken k at a time (permutations).

function.name: pexp
function.description: Returns the cumulative exponential probability distribution with rate r.

function.name: pF
function.description: Returns the cumulative F probability distribution with degrees of freedom d1 and d2.

function.name: pgamma
function.description: Returns the cumulative gamma probability distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: pgeom
function.description: Returns the cumulative geometric probability distribution with probability of success p.

function.name: phypergeom
function.description: Returns the cumulative hypergeometric probability distribution.

function.name: plnorm
function.description: Returns the cumulative lognormal probability distribution with logmean mu and logdeviation sigma.

function.name: plogis
function.description: Returns the cumulative logistic probability distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: pmt
function.description: Returns the payment for an investment or loan based on periodic, constant payments over a given number of compounding periods using a fixed interest rate and a specified present value.

function.name: pnbinom
function.description: Returns the cumulative negative binomial probability distribution with size n and probability of failure p.

function.name: pnorm
function.description: Returns the cumulative normal probability distribution with mean mu and standard deviation sigma.

function.name: pol2xy
function.description: Converts the polar coordinates of a point in 2D space to rectangular coordinates.

function.name: Polyhedron
function.description: Generates the uniform polyhedron whose name, number code, or Wythoff symbol is string S.

function.name: PolyLookup
function.description: Returns a vector containing the name, the dual name, and the Wythoff symbol for the polyhedron whose number code is n.

function.name: polyroots
function.description: Returns a vector containing all the roots of the polynomial whose coefficients are in v. Right-click on this function to choose a solver.

function.name: ppmt
function.description: Returns the payment on the principal of an investment or loan for a given period based on periodic, constant payments over a given number of compounding periods using a fixed interest rate and a specified present value.

function.name: ppois
function.description: Returns the cumulative Poisson probability distribution in which l > 0.

function.name: predict
function.description: Returns a vector of n predicted values past the last element in v, based on autocorrelation coefficients of m consecutive values in a sliding window.

function.name: Psi
function.description: Psi(x) returns the digamma function of x. Psi(n,x) returns the polygamma function of x. Can only be evaluated symbolically.

function.name: pspline
function.description: Returns a vector of cubic spline coefficients with parabolic endpoints that fits the independent data in vector or matrix vx and dependent data in vy. This vector becomes the first argument of the interp function.

function.name: pt
function.description: Returns the cumulative probability Student's t distribution with degrees of freedom d.

function.name: punif
function.description: Returns the cumulative uniform probability distribution on the interval [a,b].

function.name: pv
function.description: Returns the present value of an investment or loan based on periodic, constant payments over a given number of compounding periods using a fixed interest rate and a specified payment.

function.name: pweibull
function.description: Returns the cumulative Weibull probability distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: pwrfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing the coefficients for a power curve of the form a*x^b + c that best approximates the data in vectors vx and vy. Vector vg contains guess values for the three coefficients.

function.name: qbeta
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative beta distribution with shape parameters s1 and s2.

function.name: qbinom
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative binomial distribution with size n and probability of success q.

function.name: qcauchy
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative Cauchy distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: qchisq
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative chi-squared distribution with degrees of freedom d.

function.name: qexp
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative exponential distribution with rate r.

function.name: qF
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative F distribution with degrees of freedom d1 and d2.

function.name: qgamma
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative gamma distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: qgeom
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative geometric distribution with probability of success q.

function.name: qhypergeom
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative probability distribution for the hypergeometric distribution. p is a real number between 0 and 1. a, b, and n are integers.

function.name: qlnorm
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative lognormal distribution with logmean mu and logdeviation sigma.

function.name: qlogis
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative logistic distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: qnbinom
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative negative binomial distribution with size n and probability of failure q.

function.name: qnorm
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative normal distribution with mean mu and standard deviation sigma.

function.name: qpois
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative Poisson distribution with l > 0.

function.name: qr
function.description: Returns a matrix whose first n columns contain the square, orthonormal matrix, Q, and whose remaining columns contain the upper triangular matrix, R, forming the QR decomposition of the input matrix Q*R = A.

function.name: qt
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative Student's t distribution with degrees of freedom d.

function.name: qunif
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative uniform distribution on the interval [a,b].

function.name: qweibull
function.description: Returns the inverse cumulative Weibull distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: Radau
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the stiff differential equation specified by the derivatives in D, and initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2], using a RADAU5 method. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: rank
function.description: Returns the rank of matrix A, the number of linearly independent columns.

function.name: rate
function.description: Returns the interest rate per period of an investment or loan over a specified number of compounding periods given a periodic, constant payment and a specified present value.

function.name: rbeta
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the beta distribution with shape parameters s1 and s2.

function.name: rbinom
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the binomial distribution with size n and probability of success q.

function.name: rcauchy
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the Cauchy distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: rchisq
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the chi-squared distribution with degrees of freedom d.

function.name: Re
function.description: Returns the real part of complex number z.

function.name: READ_BLUE
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the RGB blue component of the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_GREEN
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the RGB green component of the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_HLS
function.description: Returns a packed matrix of hue, lightness, and saturation components based on the Ostwald color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file. The returned matrix contains the H, L, and S matrices packed side by side.

function.name: READ_HLS_HUE
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the HLS hues based on the Ostwald color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_HLS_LIGHT
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the HLS lightness components based on the Ostwald color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_HLS_SAT
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the HLS saturation components based on the Ostwald color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_HSV
function.description: Returns a packed matrix of hue, saturation, and value components based on Smith's HSV color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file. The returned matrix contains the H, S, and V matrices packed side by side.

function.name: READ_HSV_HUE
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the HSV hues based on Smith's HSV color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_HSV_SAT
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the HSV saturation components based on Smith's HSV color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_HSV_VALUE
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the HSV value components based on Smith's HSV color model for the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA color image in file.

function.name: READ_IMAGE
function.description: Returns a matrix containing a grayscale representation of the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA image in file.

function.name: READ_RED
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the RGB red component of the BMP, GIF, JPG, or TGA image in file.

function.name: READBIN
function.description: Returns a matrix from a single-format binary data file of specified type.

function.name: READBMP
function.description: Returns an array of integers between 0 (black) and 255 (white) representing the grayscale BMP image in file.

function.name: READFILE
function.description: Returns a matrix from the contents of a file of specified type (delimited, fixed-width, or Excel).

function.name: READPRN
function.description: Returns a matrix formed from a structured data file on your file system.

function.name: READRGB
function.description: Returns a packed matrix of red, green, and blue components for the BMP color image in file. The returned matrix contains the R, G, and B matrices packed side by side.

function.name: READWAV
function.description: Creates a matrix containing signal amplitudes in file. Each column represents a separate channel of data. Each row corresponds to a moment in time.

function.name: regress
function.description: Returns a vector of coefficients for the multivariate nth degree least-squares polynomial fit of the data in vx and vy. This vector becomes the first argument of the interp function.

function.name: relax
function.params: A, B, C, D, E, F, U, rjac
function.description: Returns a square matrix of solution values for Poisson's equation for source function F. Matrices A, B, C, D, and E specify coefficients for linearly approximating the Laplacian operator. Matrix U gives boundary values along the edges. If these are zero, use multigrid.

function.name: reverse
function.description: Reverses the order of elements in a vector, or of rows in a matrix A.

function.name: rexp
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the exponential distribution with rate r.

function.name: rF
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the F distribution with degrees of freedom d1 and d2.

function.name: rgamma
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the gamma distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: rgeom
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the geometric distribution with probability of success q.

function.name: rhypergeom
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the hypergeometric distribution.

function.name: Rkadapt
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the differential equation specified by the derivatives in D, and having initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2], using an adaptive step Runge-Kutta method. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: rkfixed
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the differential equation specified by the derivatives in D and having initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2] using a fixed step Runge-Kutta method. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: rlnorm
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the lognormal distribution with logmean mu and logdeviation sigma.

function.name: rlogis
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the logistic distribution with location l and scale s.

function.name: rnbinom
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the negative binomial distribution with size n and probability of failure p.

function.name: rnd
function.description: Returns a uniformly distributed random number between 0 and x.

function.name: rnorm
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the normal distribution with mean mu and standard deviation sigma.

function.name: root
function.description: Returns the value of var to make the function f equal to zero. If a and b are specified, root finds var on this interval. Otherwise, var must be defined with a guess value before root is called.

function.name: round
function.description: Rounds z to n places. If n is omitted, z is rounded to the nearest integer. If n < 0, z is rounded to the left of the decimal point.

function.name: Round
function.description: Rounds z to the closest multiple of y, typically used for correct unit scaling.

function.name: rows
function.description: Returns the number of rows in A.

function.name: rpois
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the Poisson distribution with l > 0.

function.name: rref
function.description: Returns a matrix representing the row-reduced echelon form of A.

function.name: rsort
function.description: Returns an array formed by rearranging columns of A until row n is in ascending order.

function.name: rt
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having Student's t distribution with d degrees of freedom.

function.name: runif
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the uniform distribution on interval [a,b].

function.name: rweibull
function.description: Returns a vector of m random numbers having the Weibull distribution with shape parameter s.

function.name: SaveColormap
function.description: Creates a colormap named file containing the values in the matrix M. Returns the number of rows written to the file.

function.name: sbval
function.params: v, x1, x2, D, load, score
function.description: Returns a set of initial conditions for the boundary value problem specified by the derivatives in D and guess values in v on the interval [x1,x2]. Parameter load contains both known initial conditions and guess values from v, and score measures solution discrepancy at x2.

function.name: search
function.description: Returns the starting position of the substring SubS in S1 beginning from position m.

function.name: sec
function.description: Returns the secant of z.

function.name: sech
function.description: Returns the hyperbolic secant of z.

function.name: Seed
function.description: Resets the random number seed to x and returns the previous value.

function.name: Shi
function.description: Returns the value of the hyperbolic sine integral function.

function.name: Si
function.description: Returns the value of the sine integral function.

function.name: sign
function.description: Returns 0 if x = 0, 1 if x > 0, and -1 otherwise. For complex values, use csgn.

function.name: signum
function.description: Returns x if z = 0 and z/|z| otherwise.

function.name: sin
function.description: Returns the sine of z.

function.name: sinc
function.description: Returns the value of sin(z)/z, with correct behavior in the limit as z approaches 0.

function.name: sinfit
function.description: Returns a vector containing the coefficients for a sine curve of the form a*sin(x +b) + c that best approximates the data in vectors vx and vy. Vector vg contains guess values for the three coefficients.

function.name: sinh
function.description: Returns the hyperbolic sine of z.

function.name: skew
function.description: Returns the skewness of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: slope
function.description: Returns the slope of line that best fits data in vx and vy.

function.name: sort
function.description: Returns a vector with the values from v sorted in ascending order.

function.name: sph2xyz
function.description: Converts the spherical coordinates of a point in 3D space to rectangular coordinates.

function.name: stack
function.description: Returns an array formed by placing A, B, C, ... top to bottom. A, B, C, ... are arrays having the same number of columns, or they are scalars and column vectors.

function.name: statespace
function.description: Returns the solution to a system of linear, first-order ordinary differential equations.

function.name: stderr
function.description: Returns the standard error associated with a linear regression for the points described by the vectors vx and vy. Measures the spread of data points about the regression line.

function.name: stdev
function.description: Returns the population standard deviation of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: Stdev
function.description: Returns the sample standard deviation of the elements of A, B, C ...

function.name: Stiffb
function.params: y, x1, x2, npoints, D, AJ
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the stiff differential equation specified by the derivatives in D, the augmented Jacobian function AJ, and initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2] using a Bulirsch-Stoer method. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: Stiffr
function.params: y, x1, x2, npoints, D, AJ
function.description: Returns a matrix of solution values for the stiff differential equation specified by the derivatives in D, the augmented Jacobian function AJ, and initial conditions y on the interval [x1,x2] using a Rosenbrock method. Parameter npoints controls the number of rows in the matrix output.

function.name: str2num
function.description: Returns a constant formed by converting string S into a number.

function.name: str2vec
function.description: Returns a vector of ASCII codes corresponding to the characters in S.

function.name: strlen
function.description: Returns the number of characters in string S.

function.name: submatrix
function.description: Returns the submatrix of array A consisting of elements in rows ir through jr and columns ic through jc of A.

function.name: substr
function.description: Returns a substring of S beginning at character m and having maximum length n.

function.name: supsmooth
function.description: Returns a vector created by the piecewise use of a symmetric nearest neighbor linear least-squares fitting on each element in vy, in which the number of nearest neighbors is adaptively chosen.

function.name: svd2
function.description: Returns a vector of 3 nested arrays. The first array contains the vector of singular values. The following two arrays are the matrices U and V.

function.name: tan
function.description: Returns the tangent of z.

function.name: tanh
function.description: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of z.

function.name: Tcheb
function.description: Returns the value of the Chebyshev polynomial of degree n, of the first kind, at x.

function.name: time
function.description: Returns the current system time. The value z is an arbitrary Mathcad expression with no impact on the return.

function.name: tr
function.description: Returns the trace of square matrix M: sum of diagonal elements.

function.name: trace
function.description: Returns a string containing the value of the arguments x, y, z, ... with print order and surrounding text specified by S. Prints values in the Trace Window when debug mode is on. S is optional if only one value is printed.

function.name: trunc
function.description: Returns the integer part of z by removing the fractional part.

function.name: Trunc
function.description: Returns the value of trunc(z/y)*y, typically used for correct unit scaling.

function.name: Ucheb
function.description: Returns the value of the Chebyshev polynomial of degree n, of the second kind, at x.

function.name: SIUnitsOf
function.description: Returns the units of x. If x has no units, returns 1.

function.name: until
function.description: Returns x until icond is negative.

function.name: var
function.description: Returns the population variance of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: Var
function.description: Returns the sample variance of the elements of A, B, C, ...

function.name: vec2str
function.description: Returns a string formed by converting the ASCII codes in v to characters.

function.name: vlookup
function.description: Looks in the first column of a matrix, A, for a given value, z, and returns the value(s) in the same row(s) in the column specified, c. When multiple values are returned, they appear in a vector.

function.name: wave
function.description: Returns the one-dimensional discrete wavelet transform of the data in v using the Daubechies 4-coefficient wavelet filter.

function.name: WRITE_HLS
function.description: Writes a packed matrix consisting of the hue, lightness, and saturation components of an image to a 16 million color Windows BMP file on your file system.

function.name: WRITE_HSV
function.description: Writes a packed matrix consisting of the hue, saturation, and value components of an image to a 16 million color Windows BMP file on your file system.

function.name: WRITEBIN
function.description: Writes an array of scalars to the binary data file named file.

function.name: WRITEBMP
function.description: Writes an array into a grayscale BMP file on your file system.

function.name: WRITEPRN
function.description: Writes an array into a file on your file system.

function.name: WRITERGB
function.description: Writes a packed matrix consisting of the red, green, and blue components image to a 16 million color Windows BMP file on your file system.

function.name: WRITEWAV
function.description: Writes a WAV signal file out of a matrix.

function.name: xy2pol
function.description: Converts the rectangular coordinates of a point in 2D space to polar coordinates.

function.name: xyz2cyl
function.description: Converts the rectangular coordinates of a point in 3D space to cylindrical coordinates.

function.name: xyz2sph
function.description: Converts the rectangular coordinates of a point in 3D space to spherical coordinates.

function.name: Y0
function.description: Returns the zeroth order Bessel function of the second kind.

function.name: Y0.sc
function.description: Returns the zeroth order Bessel function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Im(z)|).

function.name: Y1
function.description: Returns the first order Bessel function of the second kind.

function.name: Y1.sc
function.description: Returns the first order Bessel function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Im(z)|).

function.name: Yn
function.description: Returns the mth order Bessel function of the second kind.

function.name: Yn.sc
function.description: Returns the mth order Bessel function of the second kind, scaled by the factor exp(-|Im(z)|).

function.name: ys
function.description: Returns the value of the spherical Bessel function of the second kind, of order m.

function.name: Zeta
function.description: Returns the value of the Riemann Zeta function. Can only be evaluated symbolically.
